turkish_example_sentence: Biz ilkbahar mevsiminde renkli çiçek bahçesine gelmiş olsaydık, taze lale kokusunu duyabilirdik
english_example_sentence: If we had come to the colorful flower garden in spring season, we could have smelled the fresh tulip scent
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы пришли в цветной цветочный сад весной, мы могли бы почувствовать свежий аромат тюльпанов
